tool.name: Database And Cache Creation
tool.description: Create new database and cache for cell labeling.

param.name: morphology_channel
param.label: Enter morphology channel identifier. This should match the characters in filename.

param.name: original_images_path
param.label: Original images path
param.help: Enter absolute path of images from which masks are generated. e.g. '/media/robodata/your_folders/AlignedImages/'

param.name: encoded_masks_path
param.label: Encoded Mask images path
param.help: Enter absolute path of encoded mask images. e.g. '/media/robodata/your_folders/CellMasks/'

param.name: side_length
param.label: Enter the side length of cache cell image square in pixels.

param.name: db_and_cache_path
param.label: Directory to save output db file and subdir of cache images
param.help: Specify an output path. Does not have to be exist.
